sense.gloss: colour, color, hue, tint, tinge, shade
tone (of one's voice, etc.), tune, sound, ring
various, all sorts of, variety of
tone color, tone colour, tone quality, timbre
colouring, coloring, shade (of colour), hue, tone, tinge, tint
one color, one colour, one article, monochrome
same tendency, everyone being caught up in the same thing
looking for (a suitable thing or person), searching for, hunting out, picking out, shopping around for, searching (a place), ransacking
sex appeal (esp. of women), sexiness, sexual allure, seductiveness
interest in the opposite sex, sexual feelings, sexual urge
unique, distinctive, novel, singular, unusual, special
dramatization (e.g. of a novel), dramatisation, adaptation (for the stage or screen)
embellishment (of the facts), exaggeration, dramatization, embroidery
change of color, change of colour, fading, discoloration, discolouration
dark brown, colour of tanned skin
square fancy cardboard, used for autographs, poetry, etc.
coloring, colouring, colour development, production of colour
pure color, unmixed color, striking color

colour of water (esp. in rivers, lakes, sea)
multicolored, multicoloured, of various colors, of various colours
diverse, of all kinds, all manners of, a variety of
color scheme, colour scheme, coordination (of colour)

to colour, to color, to paint
to decorate, to garnish, to adorn, to add flair

sdata.j: ↑彼↑↓かれ↓はすごく↑色気↑↓いろけ↓がある。
sdata.e: He's very sexy.

sdata.j: ↑夜中↑↓よなか↓の↑猫↑↓ねこ↓はどれも↑灰色↑↓はいいろ↓。
sdata.e: All cats are grey in the dark.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓は↑少↑↓すこ↓し↑休↑↓やす↓んだほうがいいと↑思↑↓おも↓うよ。↑顔色↑↓かおいろ↓が↑悪↑↓わる↓いから。
sdata.e: I think you'd better take a rest; you look ill.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓↑今日↑↓きょう↓は↑顔色↑↓かおいろ↓が↑悪↑↓わる↓いよ。
sdata.e: You look pale today.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓は↑今日↑↓きょう↓↑顔色↑↓かおいろ↓が↑悪↑↓わる↓い。
sdata.e: You look pale today.

sdata.j: ↑今日↑↓きょう↓、↑顔色↑↓かおいろ↓が↑悪↑↓わる↓いよ。
sdata.e: You look pale today.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓は↑顔色↑↓かおいろ↓が↑悪↑↓わる↓いね？
sdata.e: You look pale.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓は↑顔色↑↓かおいろ↓がすぐれないね。
sdata.e: You look pale.

sdata.j: ↑顔色↑↓かおいろ↓がわるいですよ。
sdata.e: You look pale.

sdata.j: ↑顔色↑↓かおいろ↓がよくありません。
sdata.e: You look pale.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓は↑顔色↑↓かおいろ↓が↑悪↑↓わる↓いからすぐ↑寝↑↓ね↓たほうがいい。
sdata.e: You look pale. You had better lie down in bed at once.

sdata.j: ↑顔色↑↓かおいろ↓が↑悪↑↓わる↓いよ。すぐにベッドに↑横↑↓よこ↓になった↑方↑↓ほう↓がいい。
sdata.e: You look pale. You had better lie down in bed at once.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓は↑顔色↑↓かおいろ↓がまっ↑青↑↓さお↓だよ。
sdata.e: You are as white as a sheet.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓の↑色↑↓いろ↓に↑対↑↓たい↓する↑好↑↓この↓みは↑感心↑↓かんしん↓しない。
sdata.e: I don't like your taste in color.

sdata.j: あなたの↑色↑↓いろ↓の↑好↑↓この↓みは↑好↑↓す↓きじゃないな。
sdata.e: I don't like your taste in color.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓の↑時計↑↓とけい↓は↑形↑↓かたち↓も↑色↑↓いろ↓も↑私↑↓わたし↓のに↑似↑↓に↓ている。
sdata.e: Your watch is similar to mine in shape and color.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓が↑最↑↓もっと↓も↑好↑↓す↓きな↑色↑↓いろ↓を↑選↑↓えら↓びなさい。
sdata.e: Choose the color you like the best.

sdata.j: ↑金↑↓きむ↓は↑色↑↓いろ↓が↑真鍮↑↓しんちゅう↓と↑似↑↓に↓ている。
sdata.e: Gold is similar in color to brass.

sdata.j: ↑京都↑↓きょうと↓は↑景色↑↓けしき↓が↑美↑↓うつく↓しい↑点↑↓てん↓で↑国際↑↓こくさい↓↑的↑↓てき↓にも↑有名↑↓ゆうめい↓です。
sdata.e: Kyoto is internationally famous for its scenic beauty.

sdata.j: ↑牛↑↓うし↓は↑背↑↓せ↓の↑高↑↓たか↓い↑緑色↑↓りょくしょく↓の↑草↑↓くさ↓の↑中↑↓なか↓をゆっくり↑動↑↓うご↓いていました。
sdata.e: The cows were moving very slowly through the long green grass.

sdata.j: ↑丘↑↓おか↓から↑海↑↓うみ↓の↑美↑↓うつく↓しい↑景色↑↓けしき↓が↑眺↑↓なが↓められる。
sdata.e: We can get a beautiful view of the sea from the hill.

sdata.j: ↑気色↑↓きしょく↓↑悪↑↓わる↓い↑奴↑↓やつ↓だ。
sdata.e: He gives me the creeps.

sdata.j: ↑旗色↑↓はたいろ↓が↑悪↑↓わる↓いからこの↑辺↑↓へん↓でやめよう。
sdata.e: The odds are against me, so I think I'll quit now.

sdata.j: ↑喜色↑↓きしょく↓↑満面↑↓まんめん↓の↑笑↑↓え↓みを↑浮↑↓う↓かべているけど、↑彼↑↓かれ↓、よっぽど↑嬉↑↓うれ↓しいことがあったんだろうな。
sdata.e: You could tell by the ear-to-ear grin that came to his face that he really had something to smile about.

sdata.j: ↑顔色↑↓かおいろ↓が↑悪↑↓わる↓いですね。↑医者↑↓いしゃ↓を↑呼↑↓よ↓びましょうか。
sdata.e: You look pale. Shall I call the doctor?

sdata.j: ↑彼↑↓かれ↓は↑顔色↑↓かおいろ↓が↑悪↑↓わる↓い。
sdata.e: He looks pale.

sdata.j: ↑顔色↑↓かおいろ↓が↑悪↑↓わる↓いです。
sdata.e: He looks pale.

sdata.j: ↑顔色↑↓かおいろ↓が↑悪↑↓わる↓いよ。どうしたの？
sdata.e: You look pale. What's the matter with you?

sdata.j: ↑顔色↑↓かおいろ↓が↑悪↑↓わる↓いぞ。↑一↑↓いち↓↑日↑↓にち↓↑休↑↓やす↓んだほうがいいよ。
sdata.e: You look pale. You'd better take a day off.

sdata.j: ↑顔色↑↓かおいろ↓がよくないよ。
sdata.e: You look green.
